text: Bois d'arc (Maclura pomifera) is a species of small tree also known as the Osage-orange. Bois d'arc may also refer to: ==Places== * Bois d'Arc Township, Arkansas, a place in Arkansas * Bois D'Arc Township, Montgomery County, Illinois * Bois d'Arc, Kansas * Bois D'Arc, Missouri * Bois d'Arc, Texas ==Other uses== * Bois d'Arc Cooperative Dairy Farm Historic District, a historic district in Pettis County, Missouri * Bois D'Arc Creek, a river in Texas ==See also== * Bois d'Arc and Southern Railway
title: Bois d'arc (disambiguation)
